javadoc: A simple command to set whether or not a function has VarArgs.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a new command that will set whether or not there are VarArgs on the given
 function.

params.name: function
params.comment: The function on which to set whether or not there are VarArgs.

params.name: hasVarArgs
params.comment: true if you want to set this function to have VarArgs.

name: SetFunctionVarArgsCommand
comment: A simple command to set whether or not a function has VarArgs.
